forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sun and clouds mixed. High 11C. Winds NNE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sun and clouds mixed. High 52F. Winds NNE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly clear. Low near 5C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. Low 41F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Generally sunny despite a few afternoon clouds. High 11C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Except for a few afternoon clouds, mainly sunny. High 52F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies early will give way to cloudy skies and rain later during the night. Low 7C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies early will give way to cloudy skies and rain later during the night. Low 46F. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of rain. High 11C. Winds ESE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall may reach 25mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain. High 52F. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall possibly over one inch.

forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. Low 47F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy. High 54F. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy skies early, then partly cloudy after midnight. Low 46F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy early followed by mostly cloudy skies and a few showers later in the day. High 14C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: A mix of clouds and sun in the morning giving way to a few showers during the afternoon. High 57F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 30%.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High around 15C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. High around 60F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Areas of fog early, then partly cloudy after midnight. Low 8C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Areas of fog early, then partly cloudy after midnight. Low 47F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph.
